author: cms-sw
body:
Build rules currently force add dependency on main shared library ( generated from package/src directory) . This causes SCRAM build time warnings like [a] when the package generates EDM plugimn instead of shared library. 

This change now only add the dependency if the main package/src generates/exports a shared lib.

FYI @fwyzard @makortel 
[a]
```
****WARNING: Invalid tool RecoLocalCalo/HcalRecProducers. Please fix src/RecoLocalCalo/HcalRecProducers/plugins/BuildFile.xml file.
****WARNING: Invalid tool RecoLocalTracker/SiPixelClusterizer. Please fix src/RecoLocalTracker/SiPixelClusterizer/plugins/BuildFile.xml file.

```
title: alpaka backend: Do not add self dependency if package/src generates edm plugin
